title: Commercial Real Estate Flood Risk Assessment: Case-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic real estate market theory and fundamental environmental risk management comprehension
context.additional_context: Students explore flood risk assessment issues in real estate markets through group discussions and case analyses, utilizing digital tools for data visualization and presentation activities.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the international standard framework for assessing flood risk in commercial real estate.
Learners can analyze case studies to evaluate the impact of insurance systems on risk mitigation.
Learners perform simulations using real estate data to calculate the economic impact of flood risks.

resources: Digital Tool for Flood Risk Assessment
Commercial Real Estate Transaction Data Sample

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
